fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- At the end of each odd-numbered night, you will learn the names of three random players, at least one of which won’t be able to win with the Town. 
- At the end of each even-numbered night, you will learn the names of two random players, at least one of which will be able to win with the Town. 
- If you’re roleblocked, you won’t get your results.
